extension.name: VMCustom - VmArticle at Product Page
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: This plugin allows to associate a Joomla article to any product. The main advantage of this plugin is that if your customfield_value of ANY product is lower than 160 (innodb) or 200 (myisam) characters, it can be fully indexed within the database queries and thus making your site to run 100x to 1000x faster in case you use the product custom fields and associated filters.
